p: Prior to RNA extraction, SHSY-5Y cells were cultured in 1:1 mixture of Ham's F12 and DMEM (Gibco) medium (Gibco) with L-glutamine and phenol red, supplemented with 2 mM l-glutamine (Sigma), 10% FBS (Sigma) and 1 × PEST (Sigma). Cells were incubated at 37 °C, 5% CO2. 3 × 10 7 cells were used for RNA purification.
